fields.name: Cowboy Tanaka 7" EP
fields.description: Cowboy TanakaÆs debut EP is a wild, intricate ride through the bandÆs signature blend of math rock precision and indie emotion. Packed with jagged guitar lines, shifting rhythms, and bursts of melodic chaos, it captures the energy of late-night jam sessions and city-light introspection. Every track feels alive ù unpredictable yet deeply human. This limited-run EP is pressed with care and designed for fans who crave sound that challenges and inspires. Whether youÆre a longtime math rock devotee or new to the scene, Cowboy TanakaÆs first release is a must-have artifact from a band redefining indie experimentation.

fields.name: Black Horizon 2LP - Black
fields.description: Cowboy Tanaka û Black Horizon marks the bandÆs explosive leap from cult math-rock innovators to full-fledged sonic architects. Across ten meticulously crafted tracks, they balance intricate polyrhythms with sweeping emotional depth, pushing their sound into darker, more cinematic territory. Angular riffs collide with hypnotic basslines and dynamic shifts that keep listeners on edge yet deeply immersed. Black Horizon captures the chaos and beauty of motion ù a journey through uncertainty, tension, and release. Pressed on high-quality vinyl and wrapped in striking artwork, this album isnÆt just music ù itÆs an experience built for those who live between noise and nuance.

fields.name: Rags 2LP - Black
fields.description: Cowboy Tanaka û Rags finds the band stretching their math-rock roots into raw, expressive territory. Where Black Horizon was expansive and cinematic, Rags is intimate, urgent, and unfiltered ù a collection of songs stitched together from chaos, groove, and heart. The bandÆs signature off-kilter rhythms and angular guitars return, but this time with a looser, almost improvised energy. Themes of exhaustion, resilience, and rebirth ripple through every track, creating an album that feels both restless and deeply human. Pressed on limited-edition vinyl, Rags is a testament to Cowboy TanakaÆs evolution ù messy, beautiful, and defiantly alive.

fields.name: Gutshot 2LP - Black
fields.description: Cowboy Tanaka û Gutshot is the bandÆs boldest and most visceral statement yet ù a razor-edged blend of precision and chaos that hits straight to the core. After the introspection of Rags, Gutshot roars with urgency, channeling raw emotion through labyrinthine riffs, shifting tempos, and explosive crescendos. ItÆs math rock at its most physical and cathartic ù a soundtrack for the beautiful mess of survival. Each track feels like a punch and a confession, crafted with both fury and finesse. Pressed on heavyweight vinyl with striking minimalist artwork, Gutshot cements Cowboy Tanaka as masters of controlled disorder.

Made from soft, high-quality cotton, the t-shirt offers a comfortable, breathable fit ideal for gigs, casual wear, or long listening sessions. Its timeless design makes it a versatile staple, pairing effortlessly with jackets, jeans, or hoodies. A subtle yet powerful statement, this t-shirt lets fans carry the spirit of Cowboy TanakaÆs artistry wherever they go.
